bibl.title: Greek Ostraca from Chersonesos, Crete. Ostraca Cretica Chersonesi (O. Cret. Chers.). (Tyche. Supplementband. 6.)
bibl.note: O. Cret. Chers. 1-90 (notes of a phrontistes of an estate or notes of a wholesale merchant, second half of the second century A.D. - first half of the third century A.D. or later). - 1. Chersonesos in Antiquity. - 2. The Ostraca. - 3. The Text-forms. - 4. Names. - 5. Dating. - 6. The Scribes. - 7. Function. - 8. Transcription, Translation and Commentary on the Ostraca. - 9. Indices; - Table of Concordance. - 10. Bibliography.
